Cyber Claw:





Once she saw Dinobot approach her within the hallway, Cyber Claw growled and 
stepped back. To her, it was a threat. Sometimes she took the littlest 
things as threats. That was the way she was. With her temperament and 
weariness of Megatron, she turned that way. She watched his face and 
movements. It wasn't the same as the Dinobot face she was used to. But she 
could still read him. She bared her teeth back at him. She payed no 
attention to Sniper, now as she focused on a possible threat.

"About Megatron?" she said Dinobot, hearing about her question. She squinted 
a brief moment and leaped forward at him, in a more curious way than 
threatening. She kept her legs bent, and brought her clawless hands out to 
him. Slag her build. "Tell me if you know about Megatron!"

Primus, she was nearly desperate. She wanted to kill the son of a 
maintenance bot as well as find out why he had stopped tracking her.
